text: Ani jevha tyancyavara lata, tya savalyampramane acchadita hotata tevha te (motha) visvasa balaguna allahalaca pukaratata, ani jevha allaha tyanna tyatuna sodavuna khuskikade pohacavito, tevha tyancyapaiki kahi santulita rahatata, ani amacya ayatinca inkara kevala teca loka karatata, je vacana bhanga karanare ani krtaghna asatila
